description_expanded: PHANCIR 24-Pocket Accordion File Organizer is designed to deliver everyday reliability with thoughtful details suited for office supplies. A sturdy, freestanding accordion file organizer with 24 expandable pockets and labeled tabs. Perfect for organizing documents for home, office, school, or taxes. Built for convenience and value, it balances quality materials with practical features you can rely on at home, on the go, or as a thoughtful gift.
